notes.title: Greece
notes.description: Greece, officially the Hellenic Republic, is a country in Southeast Europe.

notes.title: Greece-Alex
notes.description: Following the assassination of Phillip II, his son Alexander III The Great assumed the leadership of the League of Corinth and launched an invasion of the Persian Empire with the combined forces of the League in 334 BC.

notes.title: Rome
notes.description: Rome is the capital city of Italy.
